record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. Con. Res. 183
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H. Con. Res. 183 -- (House of Representatives - December 06, 2007)

[Page: H14270]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to remove my name as a cosponsor of H. Con. Res. 183.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Alabama?
